lead_paragraph: A group criticized for its work with a family involved in an abuse case says it hasn’t gotten a call from the agency that criticized it.
snippet: A group criticized for its work with a family involved in an abuse case says it hasn’t gotten a call from the agency that criticized it.

headline.main: Group Awaits Contact by City in Abuse Case
headline.seo: Group Still Awaits Contact by City in Abuse Case
